an8.79:4.1: “These eight things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an8.79:4.3: They relish work, talk, and sleep. They don’t guard the sense doors and they eat too much. They relish closeness and proliferation.
an8.79:4.4: These eight things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an8.79:5.1: These eight things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an8.79:5.3: They don’t relish work, talk, and sleep. They guard the sense doors, and they don’t eat too much. They don’t relish closeness and proliferation.
an8.79:5.4: These eight things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.”
